activities.title: Invited Speakers – Decode The Future: Introduction to AI, IoT, and AIoT
activities.description: Guest lecture introducing fundamental concepts of Artificial Intelligence and Internet of Things.
activities.organizer: Student Association of D4 Informatics Engineering
activities.venue: Vocational Hall A, Campus B, UNAIR

activities.title: Invited Speakers – P4F (Pedoman Penghayatan dan Pengamalan Pancasila Al Falah) Program
activities.description: Educational program introducing technology concepts and practical activities to support student learning and creativity.
activities.organizer: Senior High School Al Falah Darmo

activities.title: Webinar – Mobile Programming and IoT
activities.description: Webinar discussing the fundamentals of mobile application development and its integration with Internet of Things systems.

activities.title: Workshop – Data Acquisition using IoT
activities.description: Hands-on workshop on collecting and processing sensor data using Internet of Things technologies.

activities.title: Workshop – Internet of Things
activities.description: Workshop introducing basic concepts, architecture, and applications of Internet of Things systems.

activities.title: Workshop - Line Tracer Robotics
activities.description: Practical robotics training focused on designing and programming line tracer robots.

activities.title: Invited Speakers – Machine Learning Introduction for High School Students
activities.description: Introductory workshop explaining basic machine learning concepts using simple and relatable examples.

activities.title: Workshop - Internet of Things for High School Teachers
activities.description: Workshop aimed at introducing IoT concepts and learning media for high school teaching activities.

activities.title: Invited Speakers – Computer Vision Introduction
activities.description: Guest lecture introducing fundamental concepts and applications of computer vision technology.

activities.title: Workshop - Internet of Things using MQTT
activities.description: Workshop on implementing IoT communication using the MQTT protocol for real-time data exchange.

activities.title: Workshop - Arduino Basics
activities.description: Introductory workshop on Arduino programming and basic electronic components.

activities.title: Invited Speaker - Electrical Circuits
activities.description: Teaching basic electrical circuit concepts including current, voltage, and resistance.

activities.title: Invited Speaker - Embedded System
activities.description: Introduction to embedded systems covering microcontrollers and basic system programming.
